definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: judge, govern (NH in deriv.; Ph. [[שפט]] = [[שׁׂפֵט]], also in n.pr.; Pun. sufet Lzb:381; BAram. [[שָֽׁפְטִין]]; As. šapâtu (t = [[ת]]), syn. dânu ([[דִּין]]), judge D1:WB 684, šipṭu ([[ט]]), prob. judgment [and šapiṭu, caption?] Jen:ZA iv (1889), 278 f.; on poss. connexion with Ar. sft. v. Nö:ZMG xi (1886), 724; on usage of vb. See Ferguson:JBL viii (1888), 130 ff.);—
act as law-giver, judge, governor (giving law, deciding controversies and executing law, civil, religious, political, social; both early and late):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God only, [[שׁׂפֵט כל הארץ]] Ge 18:25 (J), ‖[[מֶלֶח ]],[[מְחׂקֵק]] Is 33:22.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of man, Ge 19:9, Ge 19:9 (J), Moses deciding cases Ex 18:13 (E), making known statutes v:Ex 18:16 (E); so his assistants v:Ex 18:22, v:Ex 18:22, v:Ex 18:26, v:Ex 18:26 (E), ‖ De 1:16; of [[שׁפטי]] [[ישׂראל]] Nu 25:5 (executioners); ´[[י]]: set [[שׁׂפְטִים]] over Isr. Ju Jdg 2:16, Jdg 2:18, 2Sa 7:11 = 1Ch 17:10, to deliver Isr., [[שׁפט ישׂדאל]] Ju Jdg 3:10, Jdg 4:4, Jdg 10:2, Jdg 10:3 + 9 t. Ju, 1Sa 4:18, 1Sa 7:15, 1Sa 7:16, 1Sa 7:17, 2Ki 23:22, cf. 1Sa 7:6; Pt. [[שׁׂפֵט]] as subst. also Ju Jdg 2:17, Jdg 2:18, Jdg 2:19, 1Sa 8:1, 1Sa 8:2, 2Ki 23:22; ´[[שׁׂפְטֵי יִשׂ]]: 1Ch 17:6 (‖ 2Sa 7:7 [[שִׂבְטֵי]]), [[בִּימֵי שְׁפׂט הַשּׁׂפְטִים]] Ru 1:1, Ru 1:1 (cf. [[מוֹשִׁיעִים]] Ob:Ob 21); [[שׁפט]], ‖[[מֶלֶח ]] 1Sa 8:5, 1Sa 8:6, 1Sa 8:20, Ho 7:7, Ho 13:10; [[שׁׂפֵט]] [[ישׂראל]] Mic 4:14 (= king); king judges people 1Ki 3:9, 1Ki 3:9 = 2Ch 1:10, 1Ki 15:5 = 2Ch 26:21, 2Ch 1:11; abs. 1Ki 7:7, Is 16:5; ‖[[שׂרים ]] Ex 2:14 (E) Am 2:3, Zep 3:3; ‖[[יוֹעַץ ]] Is 1:26, Job 12:17, cf. Is 3:2; [[שׁׂפְטֵי אָרֶץ]] Is 40:23 (‖[[רוֹזְנִים ]]), Pr 8:16 (‖[[שׂרים ]]), Ps 2:10, Ps 148:11 (‖[[מלכים ]]); [[שׁפטינו אשׁר שׁפטונו]] Da 9:12, Da 9:12.
specif. decide controversy, discriminate betw. Persons, in civil, political, domestic and religious questions:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of God Ps 82:1: [[וּבֵין]]…[[בֵּין]] :´[[שׁ]]: Ge 16:5 (J; domestic), Ju Jdg 11:27, Jdg 11:27, 1Sa 24:13, 1Sa 24:16 (all of war), Ez Eze 34:20 (relig.); c. [[לְ]]…[[בֵּין]]: Ez Eze 34:17, Eze 34:22 (relig.); c. [[בֵּנֵינוּ]] Ge 31:53 (E; domestic), Is 2:4 = Mic 4:3 (of war); c. [[בְּ]] 2Ch 20:12 (war); c. acc. 1Ki 8:32 = 2Ch 6:23, Ec 3:17, condemning wicked and justifying righteous Job 21:22 (‖[[ידע ]]), Job 23:7; abs. Ex 5:21 (J) Job 22:13; [[חֶדֶק]] ´[[שׁ]]: Je 11:20, Ps 9:5; ´[[י]]: is [[שׁוֹפֵט חַדִּיק]] Ps 7:12.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of man, [[וּבֵין]]…[[בֵּין]] :´[[שׁ]]: Ex 18:16 (E) Nu 35:24 (P) De 1:16 (all civil), Is 5:3 (relig.); c. acc. Le 19:15 (H) De 25:1 (all civil), Ez Eze 20:4, Eze 20:4, Eze 22:2, Eze 22:2, Eze 23:36; [[מִשְׁפָּט]] ´[[שׁ]]: De 16:18, 1Ki 3:28 (Sol.); [[במשׁפטים]] Ez Eze 44:24, c. [[ל]] 2Ch 19:6; abs. Ez Eze 44:24, Is 11:3 (king); influenced by bribes Mic 3:11, Mic 7:3, Job 9:24; Absalom desires to decide cases as [[שׁׂפֵט]] 2Sa 15:4 (implying lack of such in his time); acc. to 2Ch 19:5, 2Ch 19:6 Jehoshaphat set up [[שׁפטים]], appar. for the first as judges in this specific sense; code of Dt recognizes them: [[הַשּׁׂפֵט]] declares [[דְּבַר הַמִּשְׁפָּט]] De 17:9, De 17:12, De 25:2; [[שׁפטים]] + [[שׁׂטְרִים]] De 16:18, 1Ch 23:4, 1Ch 26:29, Jos 8:33 (+ [[זְקֵנִים]]), Jos 23:2, Jos 24:1 (D; both + [[זקנים]], [[רָאשִׁים]]), + [[זקנים]] only De 21:2, Ezr 10:14, + [[כּׂהֲנִים]] De 19:17, De 19:18, [[שׂרים]] 2Ch 1:2.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: discriminating, of man only, [[משׁפט אמת]] Zec 7:9, ´[[מֵישָׁרִים שׁ]]: Ps 58:2 judge uprightly; [[משׁפט שׁלום]] Zec 8:16, [[חֶדֶק]] Pr 31:9, [[עָוֶל]] Ps 82:2.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: vindicating, c. acc.: (I) subj. God, [[יתום]] Ps 10:18, acc. pers. Ps 26:1, Ps 43:1, Ps 58:11 (rd. [[שׁׂפְטָם]] for [[שׁפטים]]), [[משׁפט]] ´[[שׁ]]: La 3:59; [[מִיַּד]] vindicate by delivering from hand of 1Sa 24:16, 2Sa 18:19, 2Sa 18:31; [[שָׁפְטֵנִי]] [[כְּ חִדְקִי]] ´[[י]]: Ps 7:9; [[שָׁפְטֵנִי כְּ חִדְקְךָ]] Ps 35:24. (2) subj. man, c. acc. [[יתום]] Is 1:17, Is 1:23; ([[ים]])[[דל]] Is 11:4, Pr 29:14, Ps 82:3; [[עניי עם]] Ps 72:4; [[משׁפט אביונים]] Je 5:28.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: condemning and punishing, (I) God ´[[כְּדַרְכֵי פ]]: acc. to ways of Ez Eze 7:3, Eze 7:8, Eze 18:30, Eze 24:14, Eze 33:20, Eze 36:19; [[במשׁפטים]] Eze 7:27, Eze 23:24; [[משׁפטי נאפות]] Eze 16:38 (= Eze 23:45 of human judges); c. acc. 1Sa 3:13, Ps 51:5, Ez Eze 11:10, Eze 11:11, Eze 21:35, Eze 35:11. (2) of man, only [[שׁׂפְטֵי נַפְשׁוֹ]] Ps 109:31 and Ez Eze 23:45 supr., prob. also Ps 141:6 (corrupt).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: at theophanic advent for final judgment: God is [[שׁׂפֵט]] Ps 50:6, Ps 75:8; [[שׁפט הארץ]] Ps 94:2, c. acc. [[בא לשׁפט הארץ]] Ps 96:13 = 1Ch 16:33, Ps 98:9; [[הארץ]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ps 82:8; [[בל הנוים]] Joe 4:12; [[עמים]] Ps 67:5; [[תבל]] Ps 9:9, Ps 96:13 = Ps 98:9; [[מישׁרים]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ps 75:3.

recipr., (Ges:§ 51 d), enter into controversy, plead: c. [[אֵת]] with, of God Je 2:35, Ez Eze 17:20, Eze 20:35, Eze 20:36, Eze 20:36, Eze 38:22; of man 1Sa 12:7 (+ [[וְאַגִּידָה לָכֶם]] LXX We Dr Bu:Hpt Now), Pr 29:9; c. [[עִם]], of God Joe 4:2, of man 2Ch 22:8; c. [[ל]], of God Je 25:31; [[יחד]] ´[[נשׁ]]: Is 43:26 have controversy together; [[באשׁ]] by fire (of God) Is 66:16; [[באמונה]] Is 59:4.
pass. be judged, Ps 9:20, Ps 37:33, Ps 109:7.

definitions.title: Pô‘el
definitions.body: Pt. sf. [[מְשׁׂפְטִי]] (dub.; Hi Bu [[מִשְׁפָּטִי]]), = my apponent-at-law (Ges:§ 55 b) Job 9:15; + Zf Job 3:15, Ps 109:31 We al.
